polimi.reds.broker.routing
Interface Reconfigurator

All Superinterfaces:
NeighborhoodChangeListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
DeferredUnsubscriptionReconfigurator, InformedLinkActivationReconfigurator
public interface Reconfigurator
extends NeighborhoodChangeListener

In a REDS broker the Reconfigurator is the module in charge of managing the dispatching network in presence of reconfigurations. In particular, it forwards subscriptions/unsubscriptions as required.
It is registered to the Overlay to receive notifications about the neighbors of the local node.
